statements: DELETE FROM legal_citations WHERE case_name = 'Smith v. Johnson' AND case_number = '2021-123';
DELETE FROM legal_citations WHERE court_name = 'Supreme Court' AND case_date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM attorneys WHERE years_practicing > 10 AND specialization = 'Criminal Law';

DELETE FROM legal_cases
WHERE case_name = 'Sample Case';

DELETE FROM citations
WHERE cited_case_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' OR citing_case_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
DELETE FROM legal_citations WHERE case_name = 'ABC Corp';
